author: bjh
msg: - Change ap_connect() to match unix version

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Change timeout style in ap_send()/ap_receive() and change to use native
thread safe select() instead of the EMX library's select().

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Add parameter scope parameter to ap_create_lock(), ignored for now.

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Assorted file I/O cleanups & fixes.
- Fix flags passed to DosOpen when reading an existing file
- Invalidate file status info after a write
- add (mostly based on the unix versions) ap_make_iov(), ap_writev(),
ap_putc(), ap_ungetc(), ap_getc(), ap_puts(), ap_flush(), ap_fgets(),
